name: Hope for love
description:
It's hard to imagine what could be worse than falling in love with an actor or a book hero.
Correctly! Fall in love with your best friend!

  • Linda is a modest girl, she is never lets the guys get close to her.
    Michael - an incorrigible womanizer who changes girls like gloves, not wanting to know them better.

  • Linda and Michael are two opposites. They are best friends since childhood, always together, always close.
    Michael treats Linda in a special way. He appreciates the friendship with her and seems to perceive her as her sister ... who will always understand and support!

  • After spending years together Linda realizes that this is not just friendship ... Yes, she loves Michael!

  • What should a modest girl do? To be just a friend and listen to stories about the next adventures of Michael? Or risk and confess to him in everything? Perhaps with Linda he will calm down and change? Maybe Linda will be different?

  • And at the very moment when Linda decides to confess to Michael, something unexpected happens ...

  • This story is based on real events. Plunging into history, you will meet unexpected turns of heroes, sometimes it will be sad, but in the finale ... you will learn the final result yourself.
    "A picture is worth a thousand words"

  • Unique and beautiful graphics, musical accompaniment will allow you to go deeper into the story in more detail.
    At any time you can save and continue the game in the place where you left off.

Have a good game!
